divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened in the early afternoon, the weather was dul and cloudy. I was out in a field next to the old shool building walking the dog when I noticed a dark shape out of the corner of my eye just below cloud level. Before I could get a proper look the object darted vertically upward into the clouds making no sound whatsover. At first I thought it was a balloon or something but after a short while it descended out of the cloud again. It hung there for about ten seconds before darting upward again. This repeated four or five times and I managed to get a picture on my phone. After the object dissapeard for the last time I waited 10-15 mins for it to return but it never did.
Summary: Dark cigar shaped craft with dark halo dropping in and out of clouds.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Preston
There were no other sightings in Preston on or around July 20th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
